page.title: 12Religion. Hoo area.
page.content: In this area there are anglican churches at Brandeston, Kettleburgh,Hoo & Letheringham. Hoo,Electoral roll 22, & Letheringham E.r.19,are part of a Benefice with 3 other churches and have a service at some time on 4 out of 5 Sundays. Brandeston,55 & Kettleburgh,31,share a rector.Kettleburgh have a service every Sunday.Brandeston have 3 services and a Sunday school which provides for the children of both parishes. There are no chapels or other places of worship in the area which is predominantly Anglican. There is a joint branch of the Mothers' Union at Brandeston and Kettleburgh.
